title: Liar’s Bar
description: Step into Liar’s Bar, the most twisted and thrilling hangout in town. This isn’t your average pub – it’s a den of lies, deception, and mind games. Grab a seat at a table of four and immerse yourself in the ultimate first-person multiplayer online experience where cunning and trickery are the name of the game.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670 (quad-core) / AMD® FX-Series™ FX-4350 (quad-core)
system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 (2 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ RX-460 (4 GB) / Intel® Arc™ A380 (6 GB)

game_info.Genre: Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
